questions: How to check if the current time is within a defined time span using ThamesThrive?
What is the "Is time between dates" plugin?
How to use the "Is time between dates" plugin?
What is the purpose of the "Is time between dates" plugin?
answer:
# Can ThamesThrive check if the current time is within a defined time span?
Yes, ThamesThrive can check if the current time is within a defined time span using the "Is time between dates" plugin
